Suicide Watch Observation Log
Name of Inmate on watch: Epstein Reg #: 763180854 Date: 7/23/19
Time Observations: Briefly note your observations. Initial all entries. Initials
7:00am Inmate comfortable (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
7:05am Inmate Epstein #76318-054 awake. Inmate advised he was ok (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
7:15am Inmate Epstein is sitting at the edge of his bed, lost in thought (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
7:30am Inmate Epstein is sitting at the edge of his bed, pensive
7:40am Inmate Epstein walked to toilet paper
7:48am Inmate Epstein is sitting on the edge of his bed, pensive
7:55am Inmate Epstein laid down
8:00am Inmate laying on his mattress, appeared to be asleep
8:12am Inmate Epstein asked for toilet paper
8:15am Inmate Epstein is sitting at the edge of his bed
8:23am Inmate Epstein asked to speak with his attorney (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
8:30am Inmate Epstein is sitting on the edge of his bed
Note to all observers: Legibly print and sign your name at the beginning of your shift.
1
DOJ-OGR-00026878
